title: Purchased Program Lissandra received Program Soraka
body: After buying some RP, i went into a custom game with a friend, I locked in lissandra and went on to purchase her skin from her champion page. I got the error message that i have no RP left, but i didnt purchase anything. I log off and back on and discover my RP was actually used up. I check my recent purchases and Program soraka was there. no idea how this could happen. I have a submitted a ticket [REQUEST #21341951](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/21341951) but they told me they do not give more refunds, which is not the case here.

replies.body:
Hey Cuca, 

This seems really odd. D: I would recommend [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to Player Support. They'll be able to take a look at your account and see what's going on. They'll also be able to make any necessary adjustments.
